import React from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; export default function Details() { return (<>

RSVP


We kindly request that you RSVP by Monday, July 5, 2021.


Click HERE to RSVP.


CEREMONY AND RECEPTION



The ceremony and reception will take place on Saturday, August 21, 2021

at the following address:

11507 Valley View Dr

Bristow, VA 20136

The order of events is as follows:




  • 5:30 PM Ceremony
  • 6:00 PM Cocktail Hour
  • 7:15 PM Introductions
  • 7:30 PM Dinner Served
  • 8:00 PM Open Photobooth
  • 8:30 PM Open Dancing
  • 11:00 PM Formal Exit



DRESS CODE


Dress to impress. Formal/Cocktail Attire.


ACCOMODATIONS


For out-of-town guests, we have reserved a block of rooms

at the Tru by Hilton Manassas for

August 19 – 22, 2021.

Click HERE to book your room.
